args.description: Check if code-daemon-v2 is running. GROUND RULES: DO NOT start or stop anything. ONLY check and report status.

args.description: Check if environment variables are loaded. GROUND RULES: DO NOT modify or expose sensitive data. Mask the API keys.

commands.result:

# Pinecone Configuration
PINECONE_API_KEY=***MASKED***

args.description: Check the context snapshot to see what was stored. GROUND RULES: DO NOT modify. ONLY read first 500 chars to understand structure.

commands.command:
cat > /tmp/rag-status-report.txt << 'EOF'
=== RAG SYSTEM STATUS REPORT ===
Generated: $(date)

COMPONENTS FOUND:
✅ Pinecone TypeScript source: /gateway/src/tools/pinecone/pinecone-rag.ts
✅ Compiled JavaScript: /gateway/dist/tools/pinecone/pinecone-rag.js
✅ Environment config: /config/pinecone.env
✅ Cache directory: /gateway/cache/pinecone/
✅ Context snapshot: context-snapshot.json (700KB)
✅ Test script: test-rag-complete.js

AVAILABLE MCP TOOLS:
1. store_context - Store messages in Pinecone
2. load_full_context - Load 50k tokens from cache/cloud
3. search_history - Search by topic/similarity
4. mark_required_reading - Mark docs as must-read

WORKING FEATURES (from test output):
✅ Storing messages to Pinecone
✅ Embedding generation with OpenAI
✅ Local cache system
✅ Context loading (messages + tokens)
✅ Topic search functionality
✅ Background Pinecone sync

MISSING/INCOMPLETE:
❓ Auto-init on new session start
❓ Integration with main MCP server
❓ Continuous background sync
❓ Auto-compaction triggers

STATUS: ~80% Complete
EOF
echo "Report created" && cat /tmp/rag-status-report.txt
